title: HUGO BOSS LOGO?
content:
Anybody know what font was used for this logo? Much appreciated. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110100203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hugo_boss_sale_5594.jpg)
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Top line custom designed; bottom line Univers.
[Berthold AG Old Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110100203/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-old-face-be/) comes reasonably close, but no stress.
Bottom line is set in [Bitstream Zurich](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110100203/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/zurich/) (_Adrian Frutiger_).
Bitstream Zurich is Bitstream's version of Univers, which I mentionned in my original reply. ;^)
